CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Crimson Analytics relative to Oracle Solutions?
SRP.A: Crimson Analytics is {below} Oracle Solutions in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total innovation index?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Oracle Solutions}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total innovation index?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Luminara R&D}.

VE.Q: What is Crimson Analytics's Innovation Index in 2003?
VE.A: Crimson Analytics's innovation index in 2003 is {41.51} index.

VE.Q: What is Oracle Solutions's Innovation Index in 1999?
VE.A: Oracle Solutions's innovation index in 1999 is {38.82} index.

VE.Q: What is Crimson Analytics's Innovation Index in 1995?
VE.A: Crimson Analytics's innovation index in 1995 is {52.13} index.

VE.Q: What are the innovation index of Crimson Analytics, Oracle Solutions, and Luminara R&D in 1992?
VE.A: Crimson Analytics's innovation index is {55.55} index, Oracle Solutions's innovation index is {55.87} index, Luminara R&D's innovation index is {37.18} index.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Innovation Index in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum innovation index is {9.54} index.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Innovation Index in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum innovation index is {64.15} index.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Innovation Index level recorded for Crimson Analytics?
EVJ.A: Crimson Analytics reached approximately {63.71} index in {1996}.

EVJ.Q: What is the lowest Innovation Index level recorded for Crimson Analytics?
EVJ.A: Crimson Analytics's lowest recorded level is approximately {38.07} index in {1994}.

SC.Q: What is the average total Innovation Index?
SC.A: The average total innovation index is {128.90} index.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Innovation Index fall between 121.44 and 134.22 index? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Innovation Index exceed 141.56 index? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Innovation Index go below 114.10 index? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Between 1990 and 2001, was the average total Innovation Index higher or lower than between 1994 and 2000?
NC.A: The average total innovation index between 1990 and 2001 was {higher} than between 1994 and 2000.

NC.Q: Between 1993 and 2001, was the average total Innovation Index higher or lower than between 1995 and 1998?
NC.A: The average total innovation index between 1993 and 2001 was {lower} than between 1995 and 1998.

NC.Q: Between 1997 and 1999, was the average total Innovation Index higher or lower than between 1995 and 2000?
NC.A: The average total innovation index between 1997 and 1999 was {lower} than between 1995 and 2000.

NC.Q: Between 1994 and 2002, did the total Innovation Index experience a larger or smaller change than between 1990 and 1993?
NC.A: The change in total innovation index between 1994 and 2002 was {smaller} than between 1990 and 1993.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Oracle Solutions} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Luminara R&D, Crimson Analytics, Oracle Solutions}.
